translation.en: [Bea] Jessie?
-Jess, are you okay? Easy. -[Jessie whimpering]
You're just having a dream.
[panting] There was this thing, like a dark thing,
translation.fr: J'ai vu cette chose, c'était sombre

translation.en: and it was coming at me.
It's just a dream.
Am I losing it, Bea?
-You think I'm losing it, don't you? -No, I don't think that.
translation.fr:
- C'est ça ?
- Non, je ne crois pas.

translation.en: Honestly.
-Just go back to sleep. Yeah? -[panting]
It's okay.
[Jessie] Bea.
Bea, wake up. Bea.
Bea, wake up.
Happy birthday!
Wow, you're so close to me.
[Bea] Do you want some tea?
What are you doing?
[Jessie] I got you a birthday present.
I know you said money was tight this year, but I couldn't resist.
translation.fr:
Je sais, on est fauchées,
mais je n'ai pas pu résister.

translation.en: Ah, look, I'm 17 now.
Maybe we don't need to do the invisible present thing.
translation.fr:
On peut arrêter
d'offrir un cadeau invisible.

translation.en: What invisible present thing?
Okay. Fine.
What is it?
Well, it's pretty obvious to everyone you're desperate to find a boyfriend.
translation.fr:
Il est clair que tu rêves
d'avoir un petit ami.

translation.en: -I don't want to find a boyfriend. -It's French perfume.
translation.fr:
- C'est faux.
- C'est un parfum français.

translation.en: Just two sprays, make any man want to make sweet love to you. Ugh.
translation.fr:
Deux pulvérisations, et tous les hommes
voudront te faire l'amour.

translation.en: -Almost too sweet, if anything. -Look, I don't…
I am not desperate for a boyfriend, I just…
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas de petit ami, je…

translation.en: -I just don't have time for men. -[laughing] My God, Bea!
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai pas le temps pour ça.
- Dieu du ciel !

translation.en: You're 17 now. You should be knee-deep in shenanigans at your age.
translation.fr:
Tu as 17 ans,
tu devrais chercher les ennuis.

translation.en: Ankle-deep at least.
Where's the shenanigans? I don't see any shenanigans.
translation.fr: Mais tu les évites, les ennuis.

translation.en: Look, stop saying "shenanigans." Oh, my God!
translation.fr: Arrête de dire ça. Bon sang.

translation.en: It's my birthday, and I'm banning the word "shenanigans."
translation.fr:
Pour mon anniversaire,
j'interdis le mot "ennuis".

translation.en: That's what I want for my present.
Well, you're not keeping the perfume as well.
[Bea] Wait a minute.
Where's Billy and Spike?
Billy, we shouldn't be here, mate.
translation.fr: Billy, on n'a rien à faire là.

translation.en: I'm too pretty to be here.
I stand out a mile. My handsomeness is making me a target.
translation.fr:
Je suis une cible,
repérable à des kilomètres.

translation.en: Just don't make eye contact with anyone.
translation.fr: Ne regarde personne dans les yeux.

translation.en: Why would you say that?
Now I'm just staring at people. I can't not make eye contact.
translation.fr: Maintenant, je ne peux pas m'en empêcher.

translation.en: Yeah! Yes!
Billy.
Billy, let's just go.
William Chisup versus Tam Bibby!
-[man] Yeah, go on then, take it. -On him!
Billy.
I think you should turn around.
Spike!
Just relax, would ya?
I've seen him.
I don't care how big he…
Shit.
-[man] Catch it! -[all cheering]
A gift from the Marquess of Bath, Your Highness.
translation.fr:
Un présent du marquis de Bath,
Votre Altesse.

translation.en: Happy birthday, sir.
Cups.
I'm so glad that word of my fondness for crockery
translation.fr: Ravi que le marquis ait eu vent

translation.en: has reached the ears of His Lordship.
translation.fr: de mon amour de la vaisselle.

translation.en: Daimler… [sighs] I've decided what I'd like for my birthday from my mother.
translation.fr:
Daimler, j'ai trouvé le cadeau
que je demanderai à ma mère.

translation.en: I wish to leave the palace.
I'm afraid Her Majesty won't allow that, sir.
translation.fr: Je crains que Sa Majesté ne refuse.

translation.en: After you went over on your ankle,
translation.fr: Vous êtes blessé à la cheville,

translation.en: Dr. Clark advised that you move around as little as possible.
translation.fr: et le Dr Clark recommande le repos.

translation.en: Make sure there's no lasting damage.
Tell my mother that I wish…
translation.fr: Informez ma mère que je veux…

translation.en: that I need to leave the palace.
translation.fr: que je dois quitter le palais.

translation.en: Just for one day.
It is my birthday and that is all I wish for.
translation.fr: C'est le seul cadeau que je veux.

translation.en: When I asked to leave the palace, I meant that I wanted to see the city.
The city is a hard place, sir.
It's not for those of a…
delicate constitution.
You know, I could've taken him.
Billy, that guy could do shits bigger than you.
translation.fr: Il chie des étrons plus gros que toi.

translation.en: -You promised me no more fighting. -I never promised you anything.
translation.fr:
- Tu avais promis d'arrêter les combats.
- Pas du tout.

translation.en: Put a shirt on!
-Why? -Because…
you'll catch a cold, and when you have a cold
translation.fr: tu vas tomber malade, et alors,

translation.en: you're even more of a bellend.
It's not like I was doing it for myself, is it?
translation.fr: Ce combat, ce n'était pas pour moi.

translation.en: She's always been… unusual, Bea,
but this is something else.
She needs help. And doctors cost money.
translation.fr:
Elle doit voir un spécialiste.
Ça coûte cher.

translation.en: Hudson cornered me yesterday. We're two months late for the rent.
translation.fr:
Hudson m'a rappelé
les deux mois de loyer en retard.

translation.en: If we don't get the money together pronto, we're out.
It's nearly winter. We'd freeze to death.
translation.fr: L'hiver approche, on mourrait de froid.

translation.en: Look, I know we don't like to talk about it,
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est un sujet sensible,

translation.en: but what about a workhouse?
translation.fr: mais il y a des hospices.

translation.en: What did you say?
I was just trying to find ways--
Don't talk to me about the workhouse, Spike.
translation.fr: Ne me parle pas des hospices, Spike.

translation.en: You don't know about the workhouse. You weren't there like the rest of us.
translation.fr:
Tu n'y as jamais été,
tu ignores ce que c'est.

translation.en: Bea.
Come on, Bea.
We've been through worse than this.
It's like you said, we survived the workhouse, for God's sake.
translation.fr: Tu l'as dit, on a survécu à l'hospice.

translation.en: Hmm. Remember when we lived with that eel lady?
translation.fr: Et la dame avec ses anguilles ?

translation.en: No one should ever have to live within three feet of an eel.
translation.fr:
Personne ne devrait vivre
avec une anguille.

translation.en: [Spike] I still dream about it.
I dream that I'm in a bath, and one of her eels are in there with me.
translation.fr:
Que je suis dans un bain
avec une de ses anguilles.

translation.en: -All of a sudden, it just finds its way-- -Yeah, all right, mate. We get it.
translation.fr:
- Et elle vient…
- C'est bon, on a compris.

translation.en: Look, Spike's point is we got through it.
translation.fr: Pour résumer, on s'en sort toujours.

translation.en: I can't lose her.
She's the only family I've got.
Well, she's not the only family you got.
translation.fr: Ta famille, ce n'est pas que Jessie.

translation.en: We're your family, too, aren't we?
translation.fr: Tu nous as, nous aussi, pas vrai ?

translation.en: Come on.
[sighs] Okay.
So, how do we get some money?
Guys, she's gone.
-[Jessie] You knew it made monsters… -[Dr. Watson] Something's come to London.
translation.fr:
- Les monstres.
- Quelque chose est ici.

translation.en: [Daimler] This is his time.
[Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl.A darkness has entered this city.
translation.fr:
Quelque chose est ici.
Les ténèbres ont envahi la ville.

translation.en: -[Bea] Jess! -[gasps]
Where is it? The dark thing? Is it gone?
translation.fr: La chose sombre, où est-elle passée ?

translation.en: [Daimler] What on earth were you doing standing in the road, girl?
translation.fr: Que faisais-tu au milieu de la route ?

translation.en: I should have you flogged.
Never mind that. What were you doing going so fast? You could've killed her.
translation.fr:
Et vous, vous alliez trop vite.
Vous auriez pu la tuer.

translation.en: Young lady, how dare you speak to your betters in that manner.
translation.fr:
Tu oses parler de la sorte
à tes supérieurs, fillette ?

translation.en: -My betters? -[Daimler] Hmm.
-My betters? -[Spike] Tell him!
[Bea] Just because you ride around in a fancy carriage and wear suits
translation.fr:
Vous avez beau vous pavaner
en costume et voiture,

translation.en: doesn't make you my better. Doesn't make you anyone's better.
-[Daimler] Now, listen here-- -No, you listen here, you prick!
translation.fr:
- Écoute…
- À vous de m'écouter, salopard !

translation.en: You may be used to bullying people and having them kiss your ass,
translation.fr:
Vous maltraitez les gens
qui vous lèchent les bottes,

translation.en: but no one talks down to me.
So get back in your carriage and piss off to wherever you came from.
translation.fr:
Alors, remontez en voiture
et allez vous faire voir.

translation.en: Go on, off you pop!
[Billy] Yeah!
[Spike] Posh prick.
[Bea] Shh, it's okay.
She's been having these dreams for two weeks now.
translation.fr:
Ces cauchemars durent
depuis deux semaines.

translation.en: You said ages ago that dreams is how it started with my mum.
translation.fr:
C'est comme ça que ça a commencé,
pour ma mère.

translation.en: I remember you telling me.
-You said towards the end that-- -[Sister Anna] Bea.
What happened to your mum isn't gonna happen to Jessie.
translation.fr: Il n'arrivera pas la même chose à Jessie.

translation.en: You're making connections that aren't there.
Why is her grave the only one that never has any flowers on it?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi c'est la seule tombe
sans fleurs ?

translation.en: Guess no one else loved her apart from me and Jessie.
translation.fr: Personne ne l'aimait à part nous.

translation.en: I'm sure that isn't true.
translation.fr: Je n'en crois pas un mot.

translation.en: What would you say if I stole some flowers off another grave and put 'em on my mum's?
translation.fr:
Et si j'en volais sur une autre tombe
et les déposais là ?

translation.en: I'd say congratulations.
You're officially going to hell.
My door is always open.
What am I gonna do, Mum?
Sister?
There's no need to be afraid.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à avoir peur.

translation.en: I'm a doctor.
Come any closer and you'll need a doctor.
translation.fr: Je vais vous y envoyer, chez le médecin.

translation.en: My business partner and I
have been watching you from our apartment on Baker Street.
translation.fr:
t'observons de chez nous,
sur Baker Street.

translation.en: We want something from you.
I have money.
I need a room.
Tell Hudson to put it on my tab.
translation.fr: Que Hudson l'ajoute à ma note.

translation.en: Take a seat.
What happens in this room will remain between us.
translation.fr: Rien ne doit sortir de cette chambre.

translation.en: Is that understood?
My business partner and I run a small detective agency.
translation.fr:
Mon associé et moi sommes
détectives privés.

translation.en: Our offices are here on Baker Street, 221B.
However…
we are reputable men,
and as such do not have access to the more
disreputable parts of London.
We need you to find information for us.
translation.fr: Tu peux nous trouver des informations.

translation.en: Should you be successful, you will receive generous compensation.
translation.fr:
Si tu réussis,
tu seras généreusement récompensée.

translation.en: I'm listening.
And they say there's no such thing as miracles.
translation.fr: Et on dit que les miracles n'existent pas.

translation.en: Four newborn babies have been stolen.
We have no idea whether they're living or dead.
translation.fr: Ils peuvent être vivants comme morts.

translation.en: The most recent was last night.
translation.fr: Le dernier rapt a eu lieu

translation.en: A baby in Bayswater was taken from a locked room.
translation.fr:
hier soir à Bayswater.
La chambre était fermée.

translation.en: Windows locked from the inside.
Cot on one side of the room,
older sistersleeping in a bed on the other.
translation.fr: De l'autre, sa grande sœur dormait.

translation.en: Mother was awake downstairs during the disappearance.
translation.fr: La mère était en bas, éveillée.

translation.en: Confirmed no one left or entered the house.
translation.fr: Elle n'a vu personne entrer ou sortir.

translation.en: We found this beneath the crib.
Why aren't the police doing anything?
translation.fr: Et la police ne fait rien ?

translation.en: Since the disappearance, the daughter hasn't returned home.
translation.fr:
Depuis, la fillette
n'est pas rentrée chez elle.

translation.en: Something is amiss.
However, as I said,
locating errant teenagers is not something we have time for.
translation.fr:
nous n'avons pas de temps
pour les petites errantes.

translation.en: That's where you and your friends come in.
translation.fr: Nous avons donc besoin de vous.

translation.en: The daughter's name is Susan Shipley. Repeat it back to me.
translation.fr:
La fillette s'appelle Susan Shipley.
Répète.

translation.en: Susan Shipley.
If you want the money…
you find her and you find out what she knows.
translation.fr: trouve-la et découvre ce qu'elle sait.

translation.en: [Billy] This is a stupid idea.
A man follows you from a graveyard and asks you to help find someone
translation.fr:
Il t'a suivie du cimetière
pour que tu l'aides

translation.en: involved in a kidnapping?
-They're private detectives. -That's what he told you.
translation.fr:
- Ils sont détectives privés.
- D'après lui.

translation.en: For all we know, this girl saw him take the baby.
translation.fr: S'il était le coupable et voulait

translation.en: Now he wants to do her in.
We have to find her and ask what she knows.
-That's it. Easy money. -Is it?
'Cause last I checked, there's four million people in London.
translation.fr:
Il y a quatre millions d'habitants
à Londres.

translation.en: -It's like looking for a-- -Found her!
She's staying above a cobblers on Brookwater Street in Clerkenwell.
translation.fr:
La cordonnerie de Brookwater Street,
à Clerkenwell.

translation.en: How did you find her?
You know Pete McGregor, the fishing wire guy?
translation.fr: Pete McGregor, qui vend le fil de pêche.

translation.en: Owed me a favor from the time I found his dog on Clapham Common.
translation.fr:
J'ai retrouvé son chien,
il me devait un service.

translation.en: He used to live in Bayswater, so I said…
-Do you know Susan Shipley? -He said, "Nah, mate."
translation.fr:
- Tu connais Susan Shipley ?
- Il a dit : "Non.

translation.en: "The only person I know down in Bayswater is me Auntie Aggie."
translation.fr:
"Sur Bayswater,
il n'y a que ma tante Aggie."

translation.en: [Billy] You didn't find Pete McGregor's dog.
You stole it when you were trying to impress that girl who loved animals.
translation.fr:
Tu l'as volé pour impressionner
une amoureuse des bêtes.

translation.en: Look, the important thing is he got his dog back. All right?
translation.fr:
Il a retrouvé son chien,
c'est le plus important.

translation.en: Anyway. Auntie Aggie's house, it smells like piss and biscuits.
translation.fr:
Bref, chez la tante Aggie,
ça refoule la pisse et les biscuits.

translation.en: Two hours she had me in there, waffling on.
Then this big fella comes in who she said was the gardener.
translation.fr:
Un grand gaillard est arrivé.
Le jardinier.

translation.en: -But they was definitely banging. -Spike!
I'm gonna need you to get to the point now, mate.
Yeah. So…
[high-pitched voice] "He's looking for a girlcalled Susan Shipley."
[deep voice] "The girl Luke Porter is courting?"
[in normal voice] And they told me Luke Porter is a member of Salaman's Bathhouse in Shoreditch.
translation.fr:
Luke Porter fréquente
les bains Salaman à Shoreditch.

translation.en: To flush him out, I went into the changing rooms, loud, like…
translation.fr:
Pour l'attirer,
dans le vestiaire, j'ai gueulé…

translation.en: Yeah, mate!
I'm sleeping with a bird from down here. She's gorgeous.
translation.fr: Je lève une belle petite du coin.

translation.en: Susan Shipley her name is.
He comes out of the shower and he's completely naked.
translation.fr:
Il est sorti de la douche,
nu comme un ver.

translation.en: His wand is flapping all over the shop.
It's very unbecoming.
Mate.
Calm your horses. I was looking for Sue. She could be in trouble.
translation.fr:
Je cherche Sue.
Elle a peut-être des ennuis.

translation.en: Yeah? [Spike] "She don't want to be found, you slag."
translation.fr:
- Ah oui ?
- "Elle veut pas qu'on la trouve."

translation.en: Have you ever heard of Edna Skiffins?
Edna Skiffins got ten years in prison for obstructing an investigation.
translation.fr:
Elle a pris dix ans de prison
pour entrave dans une enquête.

translation.en: Do you want to end up like Edna Skiffins?
Who in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth is Edna Skiffins?
translation.fr: Mais c'est qui, cette Edna Skiffins ?

translation.en: I made her up, didn't I?
-And it worked? -Yeah.
Is any of this true?
My friends, you're looking at one Miss Susan Shipley of Bayswater.
translation.fr:
Mes amis, je vous présente
Mlle Susan Shipley de Bayswater.

translation.en: I don't have to talk to you. You're not police.
translation.fr: J'ai pas à vous parler. Qu'à la police.

translation.en: No, we're not.
translation.fr: On n'est pas de la police.

translation.en: The police aren't looking for your sister anymore.
translation.fr: Elle ne cherche plus ta petite sœur.

translation.en: I guess they don't care enough about families like yours.
translation.fr:
Elle se fiche
des familles comme la tienne.

translation.en: You're lying.
Of course they're looking for her.
No one's looking for her apart from the guys who asked us to talk to you.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a que les types
qui nous ont envoyés qui la cherchent.

translation.en: Help them find her, Susan.
Tell us what you know.
That night…
the night Laura went missing…
I snuck out and left the window open.
translation.fr: je suis sortie, la fenêtre était ouverte.

translation.en: I wasn't thinking.
When I got back…
Laura was gone.
I closed the window because I knew Mom would be so mad.
translation.fr:
J'ai fermé la fenêtre,
maman m'en aurait voulu.

translation.en: It wasn't your fault, Sue.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas ta faute, Sue.

translation.en: Well, she didn't disappear into thin air. She was taken out of the window.
translation.fr:
Elle n'a pas disparu.
On l'a enlevée par la fenêtre.

translation.en: What, three floors up?
Can't even get that high with a ladder.
There is something else.
I thought I might have dreamt it, but for like…
translation.fr: J'ai cru que c'était un rêve, mais…

translation.en: five nights in a row, I heard this…
scraping and cawing outside the window.
translation.fr: comme un raclement et un croassement.

translation.en: It sounded like…
[Bea] Like what?
Jesus Christ!
-What the hell was that? -[cawing]
-[Bea] Are you all right? -[Susan] I'm okay.
-[cawing] -It's coming back. Run. Run!
Quick!
-[Billy] It's jammed! -[Bea] Billy, come on!
[Bea] Got it.
Are you all right, Bumble?
[Spike] Bea?
Billy?
I'm so glad I found you.
Ever since I saw you the other day,
translation.fr: Depuis qu'on s'est vus l'autre jour,

translation.en: I haven't stopped…
well…
thinking about you.
And what exactly have you been thinking about?
Why don't you let me show you?
I knew an excursion would leave you tired out, sir.
translation.fr: Je savais que vous rentreriez épuisé.

translation.en: But in many ways I am glad we left the palace.
You saw the type of people out there.
I did indeed. [exhales]
You do understand, Your Majesty,
that I don't keep you here because I take any pleasure from it.
translation.fr:
que je n'éprouve aucun plaisir
à vous garder ici.

translation.en: I do it because you have hemophilia.
If you hurt yourself, it could have extremely dire consequences.
translation.fr:
Une blessure pourrait
avoir des conséquences tragiques.

translation.en: I'm not to be disturbed for a while.
translation.fr: Je ne souhaite pas être dérangé.

translation.en: Under any circumstances.
Good afternoon to you, sir.
This is a fine establishment you have here.
But I'm actually looking for another pub, The Duck and Quiver?
translation.fr: Je suis à la recherche du Duck and Quiver.

translation.en: But while I'm here, one pint of ale, please.
translation.fr:
Mais puisque je suis là,
je prendrai une pinte.

translation.en: Is this sufficient payment?
Yeah, yeah.
That's the exact amount, mate.
You look like you could use a little assistance, young man.
translation.fr:
Vous auriez bien besoin d'aide,
jeune homme.

translation.en: [chuckling] Yes, as a matter of fact, I really, really could.
You see, I'm new to the city.
translation.fr: Je ne connais pas la ville.

translation.en: -Gosh. -Ha'penny just to watch.
Tuppence if you want me to relieve you.
translation.fr: Deux pence si je vous soulage.

translation.en: I'm afraid there's been some sort of dreadful misunderstanding.
translation.fr:
Je crains qu'il y ait
un horrible malentendu.

translation.en: Welcome to London!
What do you want? Did the girl talk?
What the hell have you got us involved in?
Her eyes were ripped out of her head by birds.
translation.fr: Des oiseaux lui ont arraché les yeux.

translation.en: Calm down.
Did the girl tell you anything before she died?
translation.fr: Qu'a dit la fillette avant sa mort ?

translation.en: Her name was Susan.
You don't care, do you?
Not about Susan, not about the babies.
You just care about solving the case
and getting your commission from the police.
translation.fr: et être payé par la police.

translation.en: It doesn't matter anyway. We're out.
translation.fr:
Ça n'a aucune importance.
On laisse tomber.

translation.en: We did what you asked us to.
Oh, you expect to be paid?
For what, exactly?
You need to pay me.
Pay me, or by God, I will come back
translation.fr: Ou je jure devant Dieu que je reviendrai

translation.en: and smash every window in this shithole you call a home.
translation.fr:
briser toutes les fenêtres
de votre taudis.

translation.en: And you accuse me of being in it for the money.
translation.fr: Et c'est moi qui suis vénal.

translation.en: A girl is dead and four babies are missing.
translation.fr: Une fille morte, quatre bébés évanouis.

translation.en: Now, you find me information, useful information,
and you will get your 30 pieces of silver.
translation.fr: et tu auras tes 30 pièces d'argent.

translation.en: Or do your friends and sister not need money?
translation.fr:
Ils ont besoin d'argent,
ta sœur et tes amis.

translation.en: Good. Now you stay there.
Do not move from that spot.
Now, the police, they have given us this.
translation.fr: Voici ce que la police nous a donné.

translation.en: It's the information for the other missing babies.
translation.fr: Des informations sur les autres disparus.

translation.en: Why us?
-Why'd you pick us to help? -You're from the street.
translation.fr:
- Pour l'enquête ?
- Vous connaissez la rue.

translation.en: "We're from the street." Yeah, I heard you last time.
I know bollocks when I hear it.
translation.fr: Je sais quand on me ment.

translation.en: [Jessie] You knew itmade monsters out of people. [Alice] …hole in the side of the universe.
translation.fr:
- Les monstres font des monstres.
- …un trou dans l'univers.

translation.en: [Dr. Watson] Something has come to London. A darkness has entered this city.
translation.fr:
C'est ici.
Les ténèbres ont envahi la ville.

translation.en: [Bea] What you doing out here, Jess?
[Jessie] I don't like being stuck in the cellar.
Like you said, they're just bad dreams, right?
translation.fr: Ce sont des cauchemars, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: I know it's boring, but why don't you put your feet up--
I just told you why. Stop telling me what to do.
translation.fr:
Je ne veux pas.
Ne me dis pas ce que je dois faire.

translation.en: Can I help you with something?
Nice feather.
It's a raven's feather, right?
How'd you know it was a raven's feather?
Well, um, if you turn it in the light,
you'll see it has a blue iridescent hue to it.
translation.fr: on peut voir une nuance de bleu.

translation.en: Others of the Corvus family like crows tend to have a more verdant sheen.
translation.fr:
Les autres corbeaux
ont un plumage verdoyant.

translation.en: May I ask where you acquired it?
I found it. In the street.
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvée dans la rue.

translation.en: Without wishing to cause any offense,
I find the chances of that extremely unlikely.
translation.fr: mais j'ai du mal à vous croire.

translation.en: And, pray tell, why do you think that?
Well, Corvus corax are mainly found to the north and west of England.
translation.fr:
On ne trouve ces oiseaux
que dans le nord et l'ouest.

translation.en: And Scotland.
It's highly unlikely there are any wild unkindnesses here in London.
translation.fr:
Je doute qu'on ne trouve
cette volée à Londres.

translation.en: "Unkindness" is the collective noun.
-A collective noun is-- -I know what a collective noun is.
translation.fr:
- C'est-à-dire…
- Je sais ce que ça veut dire.

translation.en: Of course. Sorry.
My name's Leop…
Just Leo.
Well, "Just Leo," you know a disturbing amount about birds.
translation.fr:
Eh bien, Léo,
tu en sais beaucoup sur les oiseaux.

translation.en: I read a lot of books.
I mean, it's all I do, really.
translation.fr: Je ne fais que ça, en réalité.

translation.en: What are you reading?
We, uh…
I don't know.
I don't know actually what I'm reading.
-Sounds intriguing. -Yeah, well, it's certainly that.
translation.fr:
- C'est intrigant.
- Quoi que ce soit, ça l'est.

translation.en: My friends and I are involved in an investigation.
translation.fr: Mes amis et moi participons à une enquête.

translation.en: What kind of investigation?
Four babies have gone missing.
Gosh.
That's awful.
May I?
Well, I'm not sure I'd be much use,
translation.fr: J'ignore si je peux être utile,

translation.en: but perhaps another perspective could help?
translation.fr:
mais deux paires d'yeux
valent mieux qu'une.

translation.en: -Interesting. -Yeah.
All four babies are female, all taken on consecutive dates.
translation.fr:
Ce sont toutes des filles,
enlevées l'une après l'autre.

translation.en: Interesting.
The most striking thing is they all appear to be born on the same day. [Bea] Mmm.
translation.fr:
Plus frappant encore,
elles sont toutes nées le même jour.

translation.en: Further, given the addresses, they were probably all born at the same hospital.
translation.fr: Et dans le même hôpital, il semblerait.

translation.en: The St. Mary's, near Paddington.
If you're able to find the other babies born on that day, in that hospital,
translation.fr:
En trouvant la liste
des bébés nés ce jour-là à Sainte Mary,

translation.en: you might be able to stop it from happening again.
Marylebone Town Hall keep all the birth certificates of that parish.
translation.fr: Les actes sont au Marylebone Town Hall.

translation.en: It's just around the corner on Gloucester Place.
I… Was that of any help at all?
I could escort you to the Town Hall, if you'd like.
translation.fr: Je peux t'y accompagner, si tu veux.

translation.en: What are you?
Sorry?
How do you mean?
-Who is he? -[Bea] Hmm?
Who?
Oh, Leo.
Just some lad.
He said he works for his uncle near Kings Cross.
-Does deliveries for him. -[Jessie] I like him.
He's tasty.
Oh, I don't.
-Yeah, but you hate posh people. -I don't hate posh people.
translation.fr:
- Tu détestes les rupins.
- C'est faux.

translation.en: You're like a racist against posh people.
It's not posh people's fault they're posh. Like it's not our fault we're common.
translation.fr:
Il est riche, c'est pas sa faute.
Pareil pour nous, les pauvres.

translation.en: [whispers] I don't hate posh people.
Yeah, keep repeating that. It makes it loads more believable.
translation.fr:
Continue à le répéter,
on y croit de plus en plus.

translation.en: Who cares who he is?
He's smart.
Very smart.
And if he can help us with the case, then I don't care what his story is.
translation.fr:
S'il peut nous aider,
je me fiche de savoir d'où il vient.

translation.en: Can I help you?
Madame, have you ever heard of a woman named Edna Skiffins? Ugh!
translation.fr:
Madame, avez-vous entendu parler
d'Edna Skiffins ?

translation.en: Edna Skiffins. Where to start…
Chaps!
I found the birth register for St. Mary's.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé le registre des naissances.

translation.en: Six girls were born there on the 2nd of October.
translation.fr: Six filles sont nées le 2 octobre.

translation.en: Four have already gone missing and one passed away after it was born.
translation.fr: Quatre ont disparu, une n'a pas survécu.

translation.en: The last one lives at 18 Persimmon Mews.
translation.fr: La dernière vit au 18 Persimmon Mews.

translation.en: Then that's where we need to go.
Beatrice…
there is something I feel I need to say.
I have to put forward the thesis that it's unlikely
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas qu'il s'agisse

translation.en: this is a natural phenomenon.
I think there's human design at play here.
What's he saying, Bea?
He's saying that someone's controlling the birds.
[Spike] Guys.
I ain't coming.
Think about what you're doing. A girl is dead.
translation.fr: Réfléchissez. Une fille a été tuée.

translation.en: Not just dead.
Her frigging eyes were pulled out of her face!
translation.fr: Ses yeux lui ont été arrachés !

translation.en: And you wanna go play at being cops?
If you had a brain cell between you, you'd walk away.
That's fine.
Jessie, go back to the cellar with him.
What? No, I'm coming with you. I want to help.
translation.fr: Non, je viens avec vous. Je veux aider.

translation.en: No, you're not. Go and put your feet up for a bit.
translation.fr: Hors de question. Rentre te reposer.

translation.en: You can't keep me cooped up all day
'cause you're worried something might happen to me.
translation.fr: me garder enfermée pour me protéger.

translation.en: Tell her, Billy.
She's right, Jess.
-Tonight could be dangerous. -We're not asking you, we're telling you.
translation.fr:
- C'est dangereux.
- On ne te laisse pas le choix.

translation.en: You're telling me?
You're not my mum, Bea. Why can't I come?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas ma mère. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: -[Bea] Because-- -Because what?
Because you're a mess, Jessie! Because you're falling to pieces.
translation.fr: Parce que tu deviens une épave, Jessie !

translation.en: And… and yes.
I'm worried about you.
We're all worried about you.
You walked in front of a horse, Jessie.
translation.fr: Tu as failli te faire écraser.

translation.en: You're lucky to be alive.
translation.fr: Tu as eu de la chance.

translation.en: I don't want you getting hurt. I…
translation.fr: J'ai peur que tu te blesses.

translation.en: I can't risk it.
I can't risk losing you as well.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te perdre aussi.

translation.en: You think I'm crazy like Mum.
You all do.
I'm just a burden to you all, aren't I?
Just someone you have to look after.
Jessie.
No… No!
Jess. Jess!
Look, no one is saying you're crazy. No one is saying that.
translation.fr: Personne ne dit que tu es folle.

translation.en: All right? Everyone's just freaking out…
[Bea] This is it. 18 Persimmon Mews.
translation.fr: On y est. Le 18 Persimmon Mews.

translation.en: The baby's gonna be asleep.
So, just switch it for the decoy and get out of there.
translation.fr:
Prends-le, installe le leurre
et sors vite.

translation.en: Is this supposed to look like a baby?
We've got limited resources.
-It's moronic. -It's fine.
No, no, no, no.
You're supposed to be asleep.
Okay.
Uh, look…
I'm gonna have to pick you up.
translation.fr: Je vais te prendre dans mes bras.

translation.en: -Please, stop crying. -[crying continues]
translation.fr: Ne pleure pas, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: [woman] Shush, sweetheart! Mommy's coming! Coming!
translation.fr: Du calme, mon amour. Maman arrive.

translation.en: [woman] I can't… I can't open the door!
[woman] Dave, come up here!
[woman] Dave, I can't get in there!
[Billy] No, no, no, no.
[Bea] It's got her!
It's just a dream. It's just a dream. It can't hurt me.
translation.fr: C'est un rêve. Je ne crains rien.

translation.en: Jessie?
-[choking] -Jessie!
It's him.
Hand over the baby now or I'll beat the crap out of you.
translation.fr: Rendez le bébé, ou je vous massacre.

translation.en: This is my baby.
She's mine!
[Spike] No.
-[choking] -No, no, no.
Jessie! Wake up!
-[choking] -Jessie, please breathe.
Hi.
-It's okay, it's okay, it's okay! -[panting]
I'm not a murderer or anything like that.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un meurtrier.

translation.en: I know this is extremely weird,
but I promise you, you are safe here.
translation.fr: mais tu es en sécurité, je te le jure.

translation.en: And I promise you, I'm not a murderer.
translation.fr: Et je ne suis pas un meurtrier.

translation.en: -Repeat, not a murderer. -Stop saying that!
translation.fr:
- Je te l'assure.
- Arrêtez de dire ça.

translation.en: Okay.
Where am I?
Well, technically, you're not really here, just your mind is.
translation.fr:
Techniquement, tu n'es pas là.
Il n'y a que ton esprit.

translation.en: Where am I?
You're in Louisiana.
-Why did he think the baby was his? -'Cause he's crazy.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi il a dit ça ?
- Il est dingue.

translation.en: No, it's too easy just to think that people are crazy.
We're missing something that…
He lost his baby.
He lost his little girl.
He's looking for her. He won't stop until he finds her.
translation.fr:
Il continuera à la chercher
jusqu'à ce qu'il la trouve.

translation.en: Until he…
The sixth baby.
The one that passed the day it was born. Show me the details.
translation.fr: Celui qui n'a pas survécu. Montre-moi.

translation.en: Lenore Hilton. Mother is Angela Hilton. Occupation: laborer.
translation.fr:
Lenore Hilton.
La mère, Angela Hilton, est ouvrière.

translation.en: Father is Arthur Hilton. Occupation…
Head Ornithologist, London Zoo.
translation.fr: ornithologue en chef au zoo de Londres.

translation.en: Got the bastard.
I swear, I'm your friend.
translation.fr: Je suis ton ami, je te le jure.

translation.en: And right now, correct me if I'm wrong,
translation.fr: Et si je ne m'abuse, en ce moment,

translation.en: you need all the friends you can get.
translation.fr: tu as bien besoin d'un ami.

translation.en: Where were you just now?
Before I brought you here?
-I was in a nightmare. -Mmm-hmm.
[shakily] I have these nightmares where I get trapped in these tunnels in hell.
translation.fr:
Je cauchemarde que je suis piégée
dans les tunnels de l'enfer.

translation.en: And there was this thing, this dark thing with a mask and…
translation.fr:
Avec cette chose sombre
qui porte un masque…

translation.en: I can't hold you here much longer. We don't have much time.
translation.fr:
Je ne pourrai pas
te retenir ici bien longtemps.

translation.en: Your friends seek a man who can control the birds, right?
translation.fr:
Tes amis cherchent un homme
qui contrôle les oiseaux.

translation.en: He's a man of the living world, a normal man.
translation.fr: Un homme normal, du monde réel.

translation.en: This man has obtained great powers,
translation.fr: Il a obtenu de grands pouvoirs.

translation.en: and I need you to find out for me where he got those powers from.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin que tu découvres comment.

translation.en: Can you do that for me, Jessica?
How?
If you touch him on the arm, like this…
translation.fr: Si tu touches son bras, comme ceci,

translation.en: you will enter his mind.
[Jessie] No!
I… I can't.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas faire ça.

translation.en: You are awakening.
-Just like I did. -I don't want this.
translation.fr:
- Comme moi avant toi.
- Je ne veux pas.

translation.en: If you want these nightmares to stop, then you must remember,
translation.fr:
Si tu veux te débarrasser des cauchemars,
tu ne dois jamais oublier ceci :

translation.en: what you thought was madness…
translation.fr: ce que tu prends pour de la folie

translation.en: is power.
We need to find the others.
[Leopold] Here it is.
The largest aviary in Europe.
Vulture, the ravens, I knew they had to come from somewhere.
translation.fr:
Voilà d'où viennent
les vautours et corneilles.

translation.en: This is him.
It has to be him.
Where are the birds?
Out stealing babies?
You've come for my babies.
You shouldn't have.
And now I'm gonna have to hurt you.
translation.fr: Je vais devoir vous faire du mal.

translation.en: You're trying to stop me finding my baby.
Your baby's dead, Arthur.
She died at the hospital, the day she was born.
translation.fr: À l'hôpital, le jour de sa naissance.

translation.en: No.
Someone took her and they swapped her!
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un l'a prise
et remplacée par une autre !

translation.en: What's he doing?
I've been too subtle in my method.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas vu assez grand.

translation.en: Why not all the birds in London?
translation.fr: Il me faut tous les oiseaux.

translation.en: Why not all the birds in England?
Close the doors!
I will find her if I have to take every baby in London!
translation.fr:
Je la trouverai,
quitte à enlever tous les bébés !

translation.en: Jess!
Go!
-I have to go over to him, Bea. -What do you mean? Why?
translation.fr:
- Je dois m'approcher de lui.
- Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I don't have time to explain. I have to touch him.
translation.fr: Pas le temps. Je dois le toucher.

translation.en: -What? No! -Please, Bea.
For once, you have to trust me.
[Bea] Jess!
What's going on?
Where are we?
We're in your memories, Arthur.
The day your daughter passed.
translation.fr: Le jour où votre fille est morte.

translation.en: No.
She's not dead.
Someone took her.
Look.
Where's the baby?
My little girl, I want to see her.
translation.fr: Ma petite fille, je veux la voir.

translation.en: I'm afraid that's not possible.
We already took the body down to the morgue.
translation.fr: Son corps est déjà à la morgue.

translation.en: -She's my baby! I want to see her! -No.
translation.fr:
- C'est mon bébé ! Je veux la voir !
- Non.

translation.en: It was too painful for you to remember, so you made yourself forget.
translation.fr:
Un souvenir trop douloureux,
alors vous l'avez effacé.

translation.en: I just wanted to say goodbye.
translation.fr: Je voulais lui dire au revoir.

translation.en: They should have let you.
I'm so sorry.
Arthur, I need to see how you got your powers.
translation.fr: Montrez-moi d'où vous tenez vos pouvoirs.

translation.en: [Arthur] Angie?
You here, my love?
I need help.
I need help finding our baby.
[The Bird Master] I never believed it would really work.
I just needed to do something.
translation.fr: Mais je devais faire quelque chose.

translation.en: And something did happen.
I could feel a power building.
I could feel myself changing.
I could feel it coursing through me.
Where did it come from?
I don't know.
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
Hiya, beautiful.
Jessie…
what did you do?
Can we go home now?
Leo?
No sign of posh boy then, I take it?
Or do your friends and sister not need money?
translation.fr:
Ils ont besoin d'argent,
ta sœur et tes amis.

translation.en: [Billy] Bumble?
Open the door!
I know you're in!
[Dr. Watson] No, I won't let you… I won't let you do this again!
translation.fr: Non, je t'en empêcherai, cette fois !

translation.en: -[glass crashes] -Stop! [grunts]
[grunts] Don't come back, then!
Goddamn you, don't you ever come back here! [breathing heavily]
How did you get in here?
The door was open.
I suppose you came for your money.
You'll be pleased to hear
all the babies were returned to their homes.
Arthur Hilton will spend the rest of his days in Bedlam.
translation.fr:
Arthur Hilton sera interné
jusqu'à sa mort.

translation.en: He's lucky the British legal system isn't au fait with the supernatural.
translation.fr:
Heureusement, le système judiciaire
ignore tout de ses pouvoirs.

translation.en: He'd be swinging from a noose.
How did you know the girl that I hang around with is my sister?
translation.fr: Comment savez-vous que c'est ma sœur ?

translation.en: Tell me,
or you'll never see any of us again.
And I think you need us. I think you need my sister.
translation.fr: Or, vous avez besoin de nous, de ma sœur.

translation.en: Your sister has a gift.
She can see things normal people cannot.
translation.fr: Elle voit ce qui nous est invisible.

translation.en: How did you know she was gifted?
When you've spent a lifetime fighting demons,
translation.fr: J'ai passé ma vie à combattre des démons,

translation.en: you get to learn how to spot an angel.
Is everything all right?
Yeah. Just getting our money.
[Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl.
A darkness has entered this city.
translation.fr: Les ténèbres ont envahi la ville.

translation.en: You think you've known horror these last few days?
translation.fr: Tu penses que tout ceci était atroce ?

translation.en: You know nothing of what it is to be afraid.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais rien de la peur.

translation.en: Don't go far.
This is just the beginning.
